title: “The US is presented with a China that is much bigger, stronger and more confident”—ructions multiply
summary:
Also on the daily podcast: the push to modernise economics teaching and a forgotten Pakistani post-disco gem“The US is presented with a China that is much bigger, stronger and more confident”—ructions multiplyTHE BIDEN administration’s early moves suggest no “reset” in relations; we recall a time when the game of ping-pong brought the countries back to the table.
Although economics has transformed in the past quarter-century, the way it is taught has not; we examine efforts to rewrite the textbooks.
And a forgotten album by British-Pakistani teenagers gets another lease of life.
